backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing three panel‑pricing related requirements referencing frontend/src/data/panels.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend files and their roles in styling, UI, and data.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH variable setup defining light/dark tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling section navigation and rendering corresponding page sections.
frontend/src/components/icons/DiscordIco: SVG-based React component rendering the Discord logo.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section showing WhatsApp and Discord buttons using configured links.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Dashbo: Dashboard with tab navigation showing panel, payment, profile, support, or status content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero banner with premium imagery, gradients, and animated headings.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PanelC: Card component displaying panel name, price range, and buy action with event handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Panels: Renders the panels list with search, duration filtering, and buy flow that opens the payment panel. Manages selected panel state and saves last selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Paymen: Implements a multi‑step payment wizard for selecting duration, paying, and submitting proof. Restores previous selections, handles UPI copy, and builds WhatsApp proof links.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Pricin: Displays a full pricing table for all panels with desktop table and mobile card layouts. Pulls panel data from PANELS to show prices across durations.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Provides a sticky navigation bar for switching between major site sections. Highlights the active section and emits changes to a parent handler.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Renders a minimal footer with branding and rights text. Styled with glass and border effects.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Shows the site header with logo and branding text. Uses a sticky glass‑styled layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThemeT: Adds a button to toggle light/dark theme using the useTheme hook. Animates sun and moon icons based on active theme.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Exports the UPI_ID constant used for payments.
frontend/src/config/social.ts: Defines WhatsApp contact number and Discord invite URL constants.
frontend/src/data/panels.ts: Defines panel and pricing interfaces and exports the PANELS list with all panel names, durations, and prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react‑query. Recreates and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Forces the app into permanent dark mode and ignores any theme changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global dark-only theme styles, Tailwind layers, and custom cyberpunk/glassmorphism utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/types/react-icons.d.ts: Adds TypeScript declarations for specific react-icons modules and icon types.
frontend/src/utils/paymentProof.ts: Builds a WhatsApp link for sending payment proof with optional panel, duration, and amount info.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp deep link for initiating a purchase message for a given panel.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Extends TypeScript env typings for Vite and process.env variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and neon/glassmorphism design tokens.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Vite's node-side files with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite config with React plugin, path aliasing, dev proxy, build settings, and env variable injection.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, design direction, known issues, and implementation status for the premium dark-only UI and payment flow redesign.
